sen.j: 安寿姫塚（あんじゅひめづか）は、森鴎外の｢山椒大夫」で有名な安寿姫の墓。
sen.e: Anjuhime is well known as Ogai MORI told about her in his novel 'Sanshodayu,' and she rests in this Tomb of Anjuhime.
Anjuhime is well known from Ogai MORI's novel 'Sanshodayu,' and she rests in the Tomb of Anjuhime.
Anjuhime is well known from Ogai MORI's novel 'Sanshodayu,' and she rests in the Tomb of Anjuhime.

sen.j: 京都府舞鶴市の西舞鶴の西側にある建部山城のふもとに位置する。
sen.e: It is located at the foot of Takebeyama-jo Castle which is in the west side of Nishi Maizuru, Maizuru City of Kyoto Prefecture.
It is located at the foot of Takebeyama-jo Castle which is in the west side of Nishi Maizuru, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
It is located at the foot of Takebeyama-jo Castle which is in the west side of Nishi Maizuru, Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 太夫の家を逃れた安寿姫は、京都へ上がろうとする途中、中山（現在の舞鶴市加佐町）から下東へ出る坂で、疲労と空腹に堪え切れず最後を遂げたもので、地元の人々に手厚く葬られたとされている。
sen.e: Escaped from Dayu's home, Anjuhime died from fatigue and hunger on her way to Kyoto at the slope road connecting Nakayama (Kasa Cho in Maizuru City) and Shimohigashi, and is said to have been buried by the nearby village people with respect.
sen.cmt: 現在，舞鶴市加佐町は合併により，存在しません．
sen.e: After escaping from the home of Dayu, Anjuhime died from fatigue and hunger on her way to Kyoto on the steep road connecting Nakayama (Kasa Cho in Maizuru City) and Shimohigashi, and is said to have been buried by the nearby village people in respect.
sen.cmt: 「Escaped from Dayu's home」→「After escaping from the home of Dayu」, 「at the slope」→「on the steep」,「with」→「in」. I think we need to explain who Dayu is.
sen.e: After escaping from the home of Dayu, Anjuhime died from fatigue and hunger on her way to Kyoto on the steep road connecting Nakayama (Kasa-cho in Maizuru City) and Shimohigashi, and is said to have been buried by the nearby village people in respect.

sen.j: 安寿姫の命日である7月14日前後の土曜日に安寿姫塚夜祭が行われており、近年は併せてろうそくイルミネーションも行われている。
sen.e: A night festival for the Tomb of Anjuhime is held on Saturday around July 14 that is the anniversary of her death, and the neighborhood has been illuminated by candles in recent years.
A night festival at the Tomb of Anjuhime is held on a Saturday around the July 14 anniversary of her death, and the neighborhood has been illuminated by candles in recent years.
sen.cmt: 「for」→「at」, 「Saturday around July 14 that is the」→「a Saturday around the July 14」- if the event has a serious tone perhaps it would be better to replace 'festival' with 'vigil'.
sen.e: A night festival at the Tomb of Anjuhime is held on a Saturday around the July 14 anniversary of her death, and the neighborhood has been illuminated by candles in recent years.

sen.j: 北近畿タンゴ鉄道 北近畿タンゴ鉄道宮津線 東雲駅徒歩約30分。
sen.e: From Shinonome Station of Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line, it is approximately 30 minutes on foot.
From Shinonome Station on the Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line it is approximately 30 minutes on foot.
From Shinonome Station on the Kitakinki Tango Railway Miyazu Line it is approximately 30 minutes on foot.

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道 舞鶴線 西舞鶴駅よりタクシーで約15分。
sen.e: From Nishimaizuru Station of JR Maizuru Line, it is approximately 15 minutes by taxi.
From Nishimaizuru Station on the JR Maizuru Line it is approximately 15 minutes by taxi.
From Nishi-Maizuru Station on the Maizuru Line run by the West Japan Railway Company, it is approximately 15 minutes by taxi.
sen.cmt: Nishi-Maizuru Station としました。JR 西日本を追加しました。

sen.j: 舞鶴若狭自動車道 舞鶴西インターチェンジより約13km。
sen.e: From Maizurunishi Interchange of Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, it is approximately13 km.
From Maizurunishi Interchange on the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway it is approximately 13 km.
From Maizurunishi Interchange on the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway it is approximately 13 km.

sen.j: 京都縦貫自動車道 舞鶴大江インターチェンジから約10km。
sen.e: From Maizuru Oe Interchange of Trans-Kyoto Express Way, it is approximately 10 km.
From Maizuru Oe Interchange on the Trans-Kyoto Expressway it is approximately 10 km.
From Maizuru Oe Interchange on the Trans-Kyoto Expressway it is approximately 10 km.
